column4: thanks for the tips. but none of them seem to be dealing with my specific problem. what is interesting is that if i reboot my computer now, it will work. but after i turn it off and on again, it won't :S then if i reboot, it works again
might want to give that a try in the forum
I mean search the forum , don'T just post , chances are your problem is already covered,   also check here https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport
